item.title: Metaballs
item.description: Unity 2D project for Game Pysics course A Unity 2D project made by me and another student for our game physics course. The project uses our own projectile and explosion physics. Configuration Speed: Sides (a,d)Height (up,down)Depth (w, s) Camera Position
